name: Friend ReQuest - A Playable Teaser (itch)
description:
Friend ReQuest - A Playable Teaser is a short character study focusing on a girl named Amity.

It is a short, simple, (2D Top Down), life simulator depicting 5 relatively average days of Amity's life and attending high school. Perform daily tasks, do activities in Amity's room, and do favors for NPCs to raise your stats. Maybe you'll make some friends along the way? The rest is yours to discover.

Step into her shoes for a while. I wonder where you'll take them?

This game is a prologue chapter for a future game in development. Kickstarter coming 2022. Any donations will go towards funding that project. 

Donate: https://bit.ly/3iNDSZA

This is a work of fiction and should be treated as such. Those who cannot discern fiction from reality should not partake in this character study.

This game is not for Children or those who are easily disturbed.
